description.value:
Wings free you from the shackles of the ground below.

Add the bat and bird forms in @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Aerial Form]{Aerial Form} to your wild shape list.

If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Insect Shape]{Insect Shape}, you also add the wasp form to your wild shape list. If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ferocious Shape]{Ferocious Shape}, you also add the pterosaur form to your wild shape list.

Whenever you use wild shape to gain a form that grants you a specific Acrobatics modifier, you gain a +1 status bonus to Acrobatics checks.

rules.label: In a form that gives an Acrobatics modifier
